price: 50. Y (si deseamos algo) Nos basta con una sola orden y (Nuestra voluntad) se cumple en un abrir y cerrar de ojos.
arabic: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā amrunā illā wāḥidatun kalamḥin bil-baṣari
